children: “Hype Boy” is a Korean-language song and the second single recorded by South Korean girl group
. It was released by ADOR on July 23, 2022, as one of the EP’s lead singles.
On July 23, NewJeans released their second single, “Hype Boy”, accompanied by a 50-second introductory clip revealing the members and four additional music videos specific to each member.
The song, written in Korean and English, has a running time of 2 minutes and 59 seconds and is composed in the key of E minor, with a tempo of 100 beats per minute.
wrote in a review for the group’s EP

that “Hype Boy” eschews the “slow-jam nostalgia” of the preceding single “Attention” and “instead invokes contemporary reimaginations of 2000s sounds with its tropical touches and future bass,” although “the way these elements are arranged make for a dreamy, almost hazy atmosphere.” In December 2022,
placed “Hype Boy” at number 24 on their list of the top 100 best songs of 2022, highlighting it as a “standout” from the group’s EP with “its addictive choreography and catchy chorus”.
named it one of the best K-pop songs of the year.

song.embed_content: Read “Hype Boy” by NewJeans (뉴진스) on Genius

. It was released by ADOR on July 23, 2022, as one of the EP’s lead singles.
On July 23, NewJeans released their second single, “Hype Boy”, accompanied by a 50-second introductory clip revealing the members and four additional music videos specific to each member.
The song, written in Korean and English, has a running time of 2 minutes and 59 seconds and is composed in the key of E minor, with a tempo of 100 beats per minute.

that “Hype Boy” eschews the “slow-jam nostalgia” of the preceding single “Attention” and “instead invokes contemporary reimaginations of 2000s sounds with its tropical touches and future bass,” although “the way these elements are arranged make for a dreamy, almost hazy atmosphere.” In December 2022,
